name: W Sword Eff (Enemy)
note:
<Reapply Reset Turns>

member.removeState(23);
}
}

} else {
user.steal += 1;
}
user.steal = user.steal.clamp(0,5)

origin.setAtkPlus(lostpower);

origin.setAtkPlus(0);
</Custom Leave Effect>

user.setAtkPlus(0)

note:
<Reapply Reset Turns>

<Custom Apply Effect>
if (user.weakcd === undefined) {
user.weakcd = 0;
}
if (user.weak === undefined) {
user.weak = 1;
} else if (user.weak === 4) {
user.weak = 4;
} else {
user.weak += 1;
}
user.weak = user.weak.clamp(0,4);
var weakness = 30 * user.weak;
user.setAtkPlus(-weakness);
</Custom Apply Effect>

user.weakcd += 1;
if (user.weakcd == 6) {
user.removeState(29);
}
}
</Custom Turn End Effect>

<Custom Leave Effect>
user.weak = 0;
user.weakcd = 0;
user.setAtkPlus(0);

user.weakcd = 0;
user.setAtkPlus(0);

name: Thunderseal

if (this.isAttack() || this.isAttackSkill()) {

user.thunseal = 0;
}

if (user.thunseal == 3) {
dmg = 50;
dmg *= 100 / (100 + target.mdf);
dmg = Math.round(dmg);
target.gainHp(-dmg);
target.startDamagePopup();

target.performCollapse();
}
target.clearResult();
user.thunseal = 0;
}
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: Arondight
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
if (this.isAttack() || this.isAttackSkill() ) {
if (user.arondight === undefined) {
user.arondight = 0;
}
user.arondight += 1;
if (user.arondight == 4) {
var foes = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < foes.length; ++i) {
var foe = foes[i];
if (foe) {
dmg = 150;
if (target.result().critical) {
dmg  *= 2.0 + (user.criticalMultiplierBonus());
}
dmg *= 100 / (100 + foe.mdf);
dmg = Math.round(dmg);
foe.gainHp(-dmg);
foe.startDamagePopup();
if (foe.isDead()) {
foe.performCollapse();
}
foe.clearResult();
foe.startAnimation(5);
}
}
user.arondight = 0;
}
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: Aphro Eff
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if any physical damage is dealt.
if (value > 0 && this.isAttackSkill() || this.isAttack()) {
  // Sets the Recoil Rate to 15%.
  var rate = 0.15;
  // Determines the amount of recoil damage dealt.
  var recoil = value * rate;
  // Sets the DEF bonus rate to 25%.
  var rate = 0.25;
  // Determines the amount of bonus damage dealt.
  var bonus = target.def * rate;
  // Rounds up the bonus damage and recoil damage.
  var dmg = Math.ceil(bonus + recoil);
dmg *= 100 / (100 + target.mdf);
dmg = Math.round(dmg);
  // Makes the attacker lose damage equal to the dmg variable.
  attacker.gainHp(-dmg);
  // Check to see if the attacker is dead.
  if (attacker.isDead()) {
    // If the attacker is dead, make it collapse.
    attacker.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

}

<Custom Select Effect>
target.nencd = target.nencd || 0;
if (target.nencd <= 0) {
if (!this.isAttack() && this.item() && DataManager.isSkill(this.item()) && this.isForOpponent()) {
var blockedtypes = [];
blockedtypes.push(0,1,3);
var blockedskills = [];
blockedskills.push(19);
if (blockedskills.contains(this.item().id) || !this.isAttackSkill()) {
this._formerItemSuccessRate = this.item().successRate;
this.item().successRate = 0;
target.startAnimation(52);
target.nencd = 10;
}
}
}
</Custom Select Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
if (value < (target.hp*0.15)) {
value = 0
}

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Check if the former success rate has been cached

  // Reset the success rate
  this.item().successRate = this._formerItemSuccessRate;
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Rough Ranger
note:
<duration: 60>

<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if attack deals damage
if (value > 0 && this.isHpEffect()) {
// Get Elements of the Attack and void damage
var elements = this.getItemElements();
value = 0;
if (elements.contains(4)) { //Checks if attack is melee which takes highest priority
console.log('Melee');
defender.getSpriteCharacter()._character.act(93);
defender.addState(76);
} else {
console.log('Ranged'); // Checks Type of Ranged attack
if (elements.contains(6)) { //Checks if attack is projectile, which will be pocketed and grant the user a barrier
console.log('Projectile');
console.log(this._item._itemId);
defender._roughrangerskill = this._item._itemId;
defender.getSpriteCharacter()._character.act(94);
defender.addState(76);
} else if (elements.contains(7)) { //Check if Attack is beam, which will produce a long lasting barrier
console.log('Beam');
defender.getSpriteCharacter()._character.act(94);
defender.addState(76);
}
}
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: Toki Mark
note:
<duration: 180>
<effects: movespeed, -2, 0>
<Category: Bypass Death Removal>


<Category: Debuff>
<Category: Slow>

<Custom Apply Effect>
target._tokidmg = target._tokidmg || 0;
target._tokidmgint = target._tokidmgint || 0;
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
console.log(value);
target._tokidmg = target._tokidmg || 0;
target._tokidmg += value;
</Custom Respond Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
if (target.isDead()) {
target._tokidmgroot._skillsCooldown[151] -= Math.round(target._tokidmgroot._skillsCooldownMax[151] * 0.5);
};
</Custom Respond Effect>

<Custom Leave Effect>
var dmg = (target._tokidmgint * -1) + (Math.round(-0.50 * target._tokidmg));
target.gainHp(dmg);
target.startDamagePopup();
if (target.isDead()) {
target._tokidmgroot._skillsCooldown[151] -= Math.round(target._tokidmgroot._skillsCooldownMax[151] * 0.5);
var char = target.getSpriteCharacter()._character;
var oldLevel = target._tokidmgroot._level;
target._tokidmgroot.gainExpCN(target.exp());
if (target._tokidmgroot._level > oldLevel) {
target._tokidmgroot.getSpriteCharacter()._character.requestAnimation(Number(Moghunter.ras_levelAnimationID));		
};		
$gameParty.gainGold(target.gold());
char.setDeadEnemy(char,char.battler());
};
user.addState(108);
target._tokidmg = 0;
target._tokidmgint = 0;
</Custom Leave Effect>

name: Crimson Court
note:
<duration: 615>


<Category: Buff>

<Custom Select Effect>
//If Enemy Skill, Skill cannot land on target
if ((this.isSkill() && this.isForOpponent())) {
this._formerItemSuccessRateCC = this.item().successRate;
this.item().successRate = 0;
target.gainTp(-10);
for (var id in target._skillsCooldown) {
if (id == 152) {
target._skillsCooldown[id] += 120;
} else {
target._skillsCooldown[id] -= 30;
}
}
}
</Custom Select Effect>

<Custom Confirm Effect>
if (target.isStateAffected(107)) {
target.addState(107);
};
</Custom Confirm Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
if (this._formerItemSuccessRateCC !== undefined) {
  this.item().successRate = this._formerItemSuccessRateCC;
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

<Custom Leave Effect>
console.log('Crimson Court Ended');
</Custom Leave Effect>

};
};
